Game is good fun if you put the time and effort in otherwise it can be very boring and not enjoyable, most of the good perks are behind playing ALOT

the downsides of this game is the toxic Survivor 4 stacks that deliberately make your life hell and the Face-camping And Tunnelling Killers that are just toxic for no reason,other than that this game is a solid 8/10 with friends, without friends a solid 5/10

If you're looking for an esport you're going to be severely frustrated. I hear chasing top ranks and high bloodpoint grinds can be a pain but overall I don't feel that's what the game is about so I can't really criticize it for that.

It's fun, especially for horror fans. You can stabby stab or run from stabby, whatever you prefer.

I mean it takes some time to get into the game, because I think the game is kind of unique. But when you get into it and understand the mechanics, its a good game. Im a survivor main and I really enjoy playing especially with friends. The game is worth it in my opinion.

Me encanta el juego, me desespera a veces cuando juego de superviviente cuando toca killers camperos y tunneleros, pero por alguna razÃ³n es un vicio. Recomendado si toleras la frustraciÃ³n o te gusta divertirte sin ser tan competitivo jajaja.
good game but hitboxes sometimes are insane
great game to play with friends hope it gets even better :D

great casual game, easy to learn difficult to master.  Play as killer or escapee.  Great to play with friends and talk through Discord or other APP.  Great to play solo with other people new or experienced.  The tree skill set slightly interesting to learn.  Once you figure it out its fun.  It was 60% off when I purchased it in October 2020.  Its  worth it in my opinion
